      • uploadSubTexture

        public static void uploadSubTexture(Image image,
                                    int target,
                                    int index,
                                    int x,
                                    int y,
                                    boolean linearizeSrgb)
        Update the texture currently bound to target at with data from the given Image at position x and y. The parameter index is used as the zoffset in case a 3d texture or texture 2d array is being updated.
        Parameters:
        image - Image with the source data (this data will be put into the texture)
        target - the target texture
        index - the mipmap level to update
        x - the x position where to put the image in the texture
        y - the y position where to put the image in the texture
